extendedInfo.description: Build a dream kingdom and wipe out invaders. Create your own Magic Era, pick up weapons, defend your homeland, conquer the world and win the glory!# Epic graphics# Hundreds of equipment items# Powerup and evolve fusion to make unique equipment of your own# Challenge other players to win battle rewards# Dungeon expedition available every day# Rich mission rewards and referral reward# Join guild and take part in Guild WarExperience more exciting features by playing Magic Era now! Have fun and win your place on the chart!

reviews.title: Solid game but...
reviews.comment: Unnecessarily time consuming, and has some seriously questionable balance issues throughout all aspects of the game.  **Update** The balance issues are far worse now. This game has stopped bein worth support. The guild function rewards offline players more then online bcause offline players consistently get kills. Bein VIP serves nearly 0 purpose. Trophy system is broken. u can fight a same lvl with little less GS & get no trophy but a person 5 lvls ahead with more GS then u can take 6 or more after u lose.
reviews.author: Jr Co

reviews.title: Think Twice
reviews.comment: Before this i like this game but now i think twice if i need to go on cause it\'s not fair if you play hard for the top and other play just get there easily by using cheat or hack,,that\'s not fair,,now i\'ll searh for other game..
reviews.author: MadJ Smile

reviews.comment: It started off a great game however now I am having problems with additional crystal purchases and I cannot change my rating. If I could I would rate it about two stars.\tWhen I purchase additional crystals sometimes they do not appear when I play the game, or it shows and an inaccurate amount when used. It wouldn\'t be a problem  if I hadn\'t spent any money.
reviews.author: Stephanie Litman

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: Add   ttx7v8   and receive 25 free crystal. To access code entry tap on your town nam9e.  Enjoy the game
reviews.author: Rafael Beas

reviews.title: Play free only, broken
reviews.comment: Reduced from 5 stars. Game stops letting you advance your fighters for no reason, you fall out of sync and never recover automatically. Lastly, games takes awards away for no reason at all. It\'s OK to play at lower levers but don\'t pay any money until game is fixed.
reviews.author: james curtis

reviews.title: Getting worse...
reviews.comment: My original rating was poor but they took care of me so I changed my rating to 5 stars. Unfortunately I have to change it back again because I have sent numerous emails to support and haven\'t heard back in weeks. Don\'t bother spending real money on trying to get higher levels. Once you get there you can\'t get higher since the match update. And don\'t use the free crystal system cause they won\'t give you all of your crystals. And don\'t trust the sales offers cause when you buy they don\'t always give the extra
reviews.author: Amy Collins

reviews.title: Excellent game
reviews.comment: Excellent game! Fun and rewarding daily events like guildwars. Never seen another game rewarding so much. Keep it up with the updates though. Can do better with more events and updates. Especially with the input of account and balance multi player trophy fights.
reviews.author: Leow Hoong

reviews.title: Good time pass :-)
reviews.comment: the game looks quite good and is fun to play, use sn6q85 code to get 25 additional crystals in the start. Guild wars are quite nice and ensues in massive battles (To beginners, Repair \"guild tower\" to join guilds). The fusion concept is really brilliant altho it takes a while to get started with. For beginners: always just try to upgrade to a higher rated equipment, the rest will take care of itself eventually :)  The new game concepts altho is a little different from before seems to be quite solid in itself. But as can be seen in comments ppl are very resistant to change ^_^  The new additional features like mutli draw and the 10 level competition has given even more reasons to play the game. Great Enjoyable Game!!
reviews.author: George Somu

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Excellent game
